language.zscript: import java.util.* import java.lang.* import org.zkoss.zk.ui.util.Clients import org.zkoss.zk.ui.event.* import org.zkoss.zk.ui.* import org.zkoss.zhtml.*

require 'java' module Java include_package 'java.util' include_package 'java.lang' include_class 'org.zkoss.zk.ui.util.Clients' include_package 'org.zkoss.zk.ui.event' include_package 'org.zkoss.zk.ui' include_package 'org.zkoss.zhtml' end def alert (m) Java::Messagebox.show m end
